features.featureTitle: Add Google Search Console ownership verification by serving the provided HTML verification file at the site root: create a static file named `google79d2180f87c8c2c7.html` whose contents are exactly `google-site-verification: google79d2180f87c8c2c7.html`, and ensure it is accessible at `https://<site-domain>/google79d2180f87c8c2c7.html`.
